Name: Iblis
About the game: The great ruler of the underworld rose to the surface in order to destroy the last stronghold of humanity and the light forces. A storm of war is brewing between the forces of darkness and light, and you will side with the devil in this war. Show all your majestic power and frighten your enemies with your infernal flames. Iblis-Top Down Shooter with 2D graphics, where the player acts as the devil and destroys the forces of light, you control various variations of the devil's weapons and can use the hell mode, a skill that will slow down your enemies plunging them into hellish horror. Feature of game: - Nice graphics - atmospheric music - 30 levels - high complexity
